channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for PR

item.title: Report I-2024100147
item.description:
Report I-2024100147

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-01T09:15:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-14
  • City: Carolina
  • State: PR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 10/14/2024 shipment was discovered during the shipment inspection process to contain hidden dangerous goods at the DHL SJU service station, 30 Central Sector Rd Caribbean Airport Facility, Carolina, PR 00979. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Shipment also contains UN1950 Aerosols, flammable UN1987 Alcohols, n.o.s.(Ethanol, Propan-2-ol) Class 2.1 Class 3 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Receptacle Packaging Type: Bottle Material ofConstruction: Metal Material of Construction: Plastic Package Capacity: 297 g Package Capacity: 30 mL Amount in Package: 297 g. Amount in Package: 30 mL Number in Shipment: 1 Number in Shipment 2 Number Failed: 1 Number Failed: 2
